summary: The diff mainly adds a deployment checklist document and updates metadata/summaries. It does not include the actual source-code change needed to revert Page 5’s heading text, and it provides no evidence of an actual redeploy or successful deployment.

missing_requirements.requirement: Undo the most recent product change by reverting the final step (Page 5) main heading text in the Valentine proposal flow to exactly: "So Shruti ❤️....".

Without changes to the step component source (e.g., FinalQuestionStep.tsx), the undo cannot be verified as implemented.
evidence: frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md (states expected heading, but is not code)

evidence: <file-diff> shows only a checklist addition and metadata updates; no deploy evidence
